item.title: Glossary
item.description: Absolute Project Progress This value indicates how much a project is advanced since its beginning. For example, a project with: Budget days: 200; Last project status: 40; Has an absolute project progress of: ( 200 - 40 ) / 200 * 100 = 80 % . Bluesky It represents the value you think is missing in order to reach an hypothetical overall value. For example: if I have an actual value of 5 but I know that, in a particular moment in time, actual value will reach the final value of 7, then I can use a Bluesky of 2.
